name: Categorized & Tagged Pages
author: Marine Gasparyan

sections.description:
“Categorized & Tagged Pages” plugin allows you to quickly add Categories and Tags to your WordPress Pages.
This plugin registers separate taxonomies for pages.

*Note: This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation.
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY, without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
sections.installation:
Upload “Categorized & Tagged Pages” plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
Just activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress and it will add category and tag support to WordPress Pages
sections.faq:
Function

Adds categories and tags functionality for your pages.
This plugin dos not adds the same ‘post_tag’ and ‘category’ taxonomies (post categories and tags).
It registers separate taxonomies for pages.

Installation

Upload “Categorized & Tagged Pages” plugin folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
Just activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress and it will add category and tag support to WordPress Pages
